content: janara bralette is a simple and stylish top the name is derived from janus god of snow in roman mythology the granny square detailing looks like a snowflake at first glance this is a size inclusive top and gorgeous in any color you choose the pattern comes with written instructions pictures and vid links to guide you through the process of creating this piece materials any sport or dk weight yarn of your choosing 3 5 mm hook happy crocheting love ro
